generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, typical of a street for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to a building.
- building: There are multiple buildings visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the sidewalk on the right side of the road, separating it from a property.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a blue circular sign and a rectangular sign with text.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and some bushes are visible along both sides of the road.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk and near the fence.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen sitting on a bench on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road.
- bus: A red and white bus is visible on the left side of the road, traveling in the same direction as the camera.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
